external_games.name: Dungeon Defenders - Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards Part 2

name: Dungeon Defenders: Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards Part 2
summary: Now that your Dungeon’s been defended, prepare to venture outside into the realms of Etheria in The Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards! Explore the desert city of Moraggo and experience 3 all new missions, story cinematics, enemies, a whole new boss, and more: This DLC pack contains: 'The Quest for the Lost Eternia Shards: Part 2'...
